title: Can I Donate Haram Books, how to get rid of them? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Ayaan from the U.S. Assalamu Alaikum. Walaikumussalam. Umm Sheikh, if I'm trying to get rid of, if I have some haram books and but when I try to get rid of them my parents insist that I donate them so what should I do? Who do these books belong to? Who owns them? Ayaan. Umm I bought them when I was like younger and ignorant. My parents bought them for me but technically I would say they're like mine. If they're yours just ditch them and throw them in the garbage without them seeing you. you
